common.questionnavigateaway: Are you sure you want to navigate away?
common.screenreader.nooptionselected: You did not select any option.
pagenotfound.explanation: The URL you are using is not correct. For security reasons, you are not allowed to manually refresh the website or use the navigation buttons of your browser. Please restart the voting process using the URL shown on your voting card.
pagenotfound.VOTING_CLIENT_TIME_ERROR.me: The system time of your device does not match the system time of the server. For security reasons, the system times of the server and your device must match in order to log in to the e-voting system. Please correct your system time and restart your browser, or use another device for voting.
compatibilityCheck.browserNotCompatible: Your browser appears to be incompatible with the voter portal. Please follow the recommendations of your canton regarding supported browsers.
legalterms.title: Penal provisions concerning the use of the voter portal
legalterms.legalwarning: The Swiss Criminal Code (StGB; SR 311.0) punishes offenses against the will of the people in its fourteenth title (Art. 279 to Art. 283). Offenders can face imprisonment for up to three years or a fine, particularly for the following actions,
legalterms.law.bullet1: anyone who prevents a person entitled to vote from exercising their right to vote or to participate in an election by using violence or by threatening them with serious disadvantages, or who forces them to exercise their right to vote in a particular manner or at all by using violence or threats of serious disadvantages (Art. 280 para. 1 and 2)
legalterms.law.bullet2: anyone who participates without authorization in an election or vote (Art. 282 no. 1 para. 2)
legalterms.law.bullet3: anyone who falsifies the results of an election or a vote, in particular by adding, changing, omitting, or striking out ballots or signatures (Art. 282 no. 1 para. 3)
legalterms.law.bullet4: anyone who systematically collects, completes, or alters ballot papers or distributes such ballot papers (Art. 282<sup>bis</sup>)
legalterms.law.bullet5: anyone who gains knowledge of how individual entitled persons vote or elects through unlawful means (Art. 283)
legalterms.confirmcheck: Have you taken note of the above-mentioned penal provisions?

startvoting.key.charcaseinfo: You can use both upper and lowercase.

startvoting.leave.yob: You left the voting process. Please login again with your Initialization Code and your year of birth to record your vote permanently.
startvoting.quittedsuccessfully.1: You have already successfully completed the voting process.
startvoting.quittedsuccessfully.2: As long as you have correctly verified the codes, you have no further action to take and can close your browser.
startvoting.quittedsuccessfully.3: Your vote has been successfully confirmed.
startvoting.quittedsuccessfully.4: However, you can log in as often as you like (even with other devices) to check the finalization code.
startvoting.quittedsuccessfully.5: If you want to ensure that no reconstruction of your ballot can be made on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone), we recommend clearing your browser cache after each vote.
startvoting.quittedsuccessfully.6: You can find instructions on this here.

As long as you have not entered the confirmation code in the following step 6, you can cancel the process at any time and instead vote by mail or at the ballot box. {{config:voting_card_remark_2}}

cancelvote.title: Are you sure you want to cancel the voting process?
cancelvote.note.1: If you cancel your voting process you will lose your choices.
cancelvote.note.2: You can return and start the online voting process again or vote in paper.
leaveprocess.title: Are you sure you want to leave the voting process?
leaveprocess.note.1: Please note the voting process has not been completed. When you log in again, the Choice Codes will be displayed.
quitprocess.title: Are you sure you want to leave the voting process?
quitprocess.note: Please note that your vote is confirmed. When you log in again the Vote Cast Return Code will be displayed.
faq.howtostart.title: How do I start?
faq.howtostart.content.yob: To start the voting process, please enter the Initialization Code as well as your year of birth. The Initialization Code is {{config:voting_card_2}} that you have received by mail.
faq.howtostart.content.dob: To start the voting process, please enter the Initialization Code as well as your date of birth. The Initialization Code is {{config:voting_card_2}} that you have received by mail.
faq.whatisvotingcard.title: What is {{config:voting_card_4}}?
faq.whatisvotingcard.1: {{config:voting_card_5}} contains the needed keys and codes for the voting process. You will receive it via postal mail.
faq.whatisvotingcard.listitem.1: Initialization-code: you will have to introduce this key to get into the voting platform.
faq.whatisvotingcard.listitem.2: Choice Codes: you will have to verify that the displayed codes match the ones you have {{config:voting_card_2}}.
faq.whatisvotingcard.listitem.3: Confirmation Key: you will have to introduce this key to validate your options and cast the vote.
faq.whatisvotingcard.listitem.4: Vote Cast Return Code: you will have to verify this code is the same as the one you have {{config:voting_card_2}}.
faq.whatisstartvotingkey.title: What is the Initialization Code?
faq.whatisstartvotingkey: The Initialization Code (identified with a TRIANGLE), is a set of numbers or a combination of letters and numbers provided {{config:voting_card_2}} via postal mail. You will have to type them in the first screen of the portal to identify yourself and to start the voting process. Note: If you enter a wrong key or leave spaces in blank the system will inform you with an error message.
faq.howtomakeachoice.title: How to make a choice?
faq.howtomakeachoice.1: You answer a question by clicking on the checkbox at the desired answer ("Yes" or "No") in step 3 "Select Answers". If you want to vote blank, do not click any of the checkboxes.
faq.howtomakeachoice.2: You can select your options by clicking the checkboxes in the list. If you wish to change your choices deselect the checkbox and click in the final option box.
faq.howtomakeachoice.3: To elect a candidate, please click on "Select" to choose a list or a candidate. If you wish to cast a blank vote, do not choose any candidate.
faq.howtomakeachoice.4: With "Edit" or "Clear", you can change your choices.
faq.canichangeselection.title: Can I change my selection?
faq.canichangeselection.1: Once you reach screen 4 "Review and Seal," you can change your options by selecting the "Change" link and choosing new options.
faq.canichangeselection.2: Click on the "Change" link to modify your choice.
faq.canichangeselection.3: As soon as you click on the "Review and Seal" link, you will no longer be able to modify your vote at step 5 "Verify Codes."
faq.whatarechoicecodes.title: What are Choice Codes?
faq.whatarechoicecodes.1: The Choice Codes are printed {{config:voting_card_2}}, which you received by mail, or they may be on a separate sheet included in your voting materials. They are marked with a DIAMOND.
faq.whatarechoicecodes.2: The Choice Codes consist of a series of numbers that will be displayed on the screen at step 5 "Verify Codes."
faq.whatarechoicecodes.3: Compare the Choice Codes displayed on the screen with those printed {{config:voting_card_2}}. If the codes match, you know that your choice has been correctly sealed.
faq.whatarechoicecodes.4: For each question, you must verify that the displayed verification code corresponds to your choice.
faq.whatisconfirmationkey.title: What is the Confirmation Key?
faq.whatisconfirmationkey.1: The Confirmation Key (identified with a PENTAGON) is a key to validate your options and cast the vote. It is printed {{config:voting_card_2}}
faq.whatisconfirmationkey.2: Once the displayed codes match the 'Choice Codes' you should type the 'Confirmation Key' (provided in the Voting card by traditional mail) to confirm your vote. This action will effectively cast your vote.
faq.whatisvotecastreturncode.title: What is the Vote Cast Return Code?
faq.whatisvotecastreturncode: You will have to verify that the displayed code matches the 'Vote Cast Return Code' identified with a STAR {{config:voting_card_2}}. If they both match then the voting process has been completed successfully.
faq.whatifcodesdonotmatch.title: What if codes do not match?
faq.whatifcodesdonotmatch.1: If the finalization or verification codes do not match, it indicates that the votes were not transmitted or received correctly by the voting and election servers.
faq.whatifcodesdonotmatch.2: If the verification codes do not match, you must stop the voting process. The vote must then be conducted by mail or in-person at the polling station. Please contact {{config:support}}. {{config:voting_card_remark_1}}
faq.whatifcodesdonotmatch.3: If the finalization code does not match, then contact immediately {{config:support}}
faq.whatisdifferencesealandcast.title: What is the difference between seal and cast?
faq.whatisdifferencesealandcast.1: “Sealing” a vote means to include your choices into a virtual envelop. To complete the voting process you will need to cast it. If you leave the process at this stage you will be able to return later on but you will not be able to change your options. To do so you will need to vote in paper through the traditional way. “Casting” a vote means to include this envelope with your choices into a ballot, making your vote effective. However, whenever a vote is cast, it is considered a final submission and therefore the voter is not able to vote again in the same election.
faq.canileaveanytime.title: Can I leave or cancel my voting anytime?
faq.canileaveanytime.1: You can cancel the voting process at any time before casting your vote into the electronic ballot box in step 6. Remember to enter your confirmation code to deposit your vote into the electronic ballot box and complete the voting process.
faq.canileaveanytime.2: If you leave the process before verifying and encrypting your vote in step 4, your responses will be lost. In this case, you will need to start again at step 2 and recapture your vote. If you leave the process at step 5, your responses will be saved. If you re-identify after entering the initialization code and authentication feature, proceed to step 5. If you log in again, you will only see the verification codes.
faq.canileaveanytime.3: As long as you have not entered the confirmation code, you can cancel the electronic voting process at any time and choose to vote or cast your vote by mail or at the ballot box instead. {{config:voting_card_remark_2}}
faq.howtousewritins.title: How can I use write-ins?
faq.howtousewritins.1: Click on "Choose" or "Change". At the bottom, you will find the possibility to select a write-in option. By selecting this option, you can enter your choice in a write-in field.
faq.howtousewritins.2: You just need to type the name and first name of the desired candidate into the field provided to this aim.
faq.howtousewritins.3: If possible, please provide additional information (year of birth or address) to clearly identify the candidate.
faq.howtousewritins.4: The typed text is validated, consists at least of a last name and first name, and can contain any of these valid values:
faq.howtousewritins.listitem.2: Uppercase characters from A to Z
faq.howtousewritins.listitem.3: Lowercase characters from a to z
finalization.votingprocesssuccessful: The voting process has been successfully completed. You may now close your browser.
finalization.votealreadyregistered: Your vote has already been registered
finalization.checkcode: Below you will find your finalisation code. It should match the code on your voting card. If the codes do not match, please contact the support.
finalization.clearbrowsercacherecommande: For additional security, we recommend you to clear your browser cache to remove any data related to your vote. You can find an instruction here
